alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 9:55AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dent, northeastern Pulaski and southern Phelps Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 955 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Robert, or 9 miles northeast of Waynesville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Fort Leonard Wood, Salem, Waynesville, St. Robert, Doolittle, Newburg, Edgar Springs, Lenox, Devil`s Elbow, Lake Spring, Anutt, Bangert, Howes, Lecoma and Jerome. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 156 and 169, between mile markers 171 and 175, and between mile markers 180 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for south central, central and east central Missouri.
